title: Ryan Whitney In Studio, Hank Gets Public Support From Tom Brady & FAQ's
description:
We start on zoom with some unexciting NBA games from Tuesday night plus the best part of the night Kenny vs Chuck to the video board. (00:02:23-00:16:38) Back in studio we talk Bucks/Celtics and Warriors/Griz as well as hockey talk and Hank gets a public show of support from Tom Brady. (00:17:58-00:38:35) Hot Seat/Cool Throne including Swag Kelly being back with the crew. (00:39:50-00:57:13) Ryan Whitney joins us in studio to talk NHL Playoffs, his golf game, Billy's terrible question and tons more. (00:58:51-01:48:29) We finish with some listener FAQ's.Â (01:49:49-02:02:26)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
